author: modena
title: Great colours!
review:
This was a nice set, but it has bad playability on its own. It has good colous, which makes it ideal to use with other sets.

Pros:

  • Great colours!
  • Rare colours!
  • Lots of bricks!

Cons:

  • No plates.
  • No angled bricks (roof plates, etc.)
  • Too many 2x bricks (the walls you build will usually be 2 knobs wide)

Overall:

This will be an enjoyable set if you use it with another set with more detail. Otherwise, get this set if your houses need more walls, or higher walls.

So I really recommend this set if your house is too small, or if you house is totally white.
